engines#1: We specify npm >= 2 to get proper local dependency support in
engines#2: application itself ; this is not a package dependency per se.
name: filog

scripts.compile: rm -r lib/* ../../node_modules/filog ; npm i && babel --presets es2015,stage-0 -d lib/ src/ && ( cd ../.. ; npm i ; touch * )
scripts.test: npm run test-compile && time -p mocha --compilers js:babel-core/register
